= Accessing PassKit’s API in Other Languages =

You can consume this API via [https://www.mashape.com/passkit/passkit Mashape], which provides PHP, Ruby, Python, Objective-C, .Net, and Java libraries.

To get started:
  # Create an account on [https://www.mashape.com/signup Mashape].
  # Open this link in a browser (using your Mashape username): {{{https://api.passkit.com/v1/mashape/{Mashape username} }}}
  # Test the Authenticate method: https://www.mashape.com/passkit/passkit#!endpoint-Authenticate

Now you're ready to use the PassKit API in the language of your choice!
